title: Slum Rehabilitation scheme can be taken up on the final plots of the Town Planning Scheme, as per these regulations and further as per conditions given below
clause_text: Slum Rehabilitation scheme can be taken up on the final plots of the Town Planning Scheme, as per these regulations and further as per conditions given below.
section: Slum Rehabilitation Permissible on Town Planning Scheme Plots :-
